doc.name: input-secure
doc.description:
As off version 0.8.0.7.2.2

In the config file "sec" should be set to true for this to work!

The secure field is as a hidden field, just the name and value are not readable.
doc.parameters: type="secure" All other valid parameters for an input field are valid, but will be never used on a hidden field
doc.note: When using action="get" a secure field will not be returned in the url
